title: Puritan's Pride Triple Strength Glucosamine Chondroitin with Vitamin D3 and Boswellia Serrata Extract, 2,000IU per serving, 80 Coated Caplets
description: If you live an active, on-the-go lifestyle, your joints likely take a beating. Each day, your joints absorb numerous outside forces that work to break them down over time. Joint support supplements can help slow this breakdown and support your joints and the cartilage that comprises them.Puritan’s Pride Triple Strength supplement contains the beneficial properties of Glucosamine Chondroitin, Vitamin D3, and Boswellia Serrata Extract in one convenient, easy-to-swallow caplet. Glucosamine HCL, Chondroitin Sulfate, and Boswellia Serrata Extract work together to support joint and cartilage health. This supplement also contains Mobili-Flex, a proprietary blend that lubricates joints to further promote comfort and flexibility** With the added benefit of 2000 IUs of Vitamin D3, this supplement can assist in the absorption of Calcium and help maintain healthy bones in adults.**Adults should take 2 caplets per day, preferably with meals. Our joint support supplement is free of artificial flavors and sweeteners. It contains no preservatives, sugar, milk, lactose, soy, gluten, wheat, or yeast.
